review.title: “a learning rewarding experience that ended too soon because of a recession.”
review.pros: Pros – 1. anyone that wanted to could advance.2. when you need time off it could be arranged.3. reward incentives for being safe.4. company stressed safety and had a very low accident ratio.5. company believed in socializing and had yearly picnic and chrismas party.6. company would try to put you on job sites close to home.
review.cons: Cons – 1. some upper management shows too much favoritism.2. when a job is in fast pace mode thier is mandatory o. t. and it is almost impossible to get time off.3. when a dispute arises company almost always sides with superintendent even if they appear wrong.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – all management, whether your forman, superintendent, or project manager, should listen to all employee ideas or thoughts. anyone could have a good idea, even the newest laborer.
